name: SolARBa
description: SolArba is a deflationary utility token. We have a unique Solana Volume but that provides consistent buybacks for LP Adds and burns. In addition there is revenue shar for holders. We have multiple pools that provide an arbitrage opportunity and a 2% Tax on Fluxbeam and transfers. The team is DOXXED and continues to build additonal utilities based on the feedback of our community. We are excited to expand to new DEXs and grow our market share.
